articles.author: Kate Nicholson
articles.title: William silenced Diana comparison before Harry’s sad admission: ‘Not trying to fill shoes' - Express
articles.description: PRINCE WILLIAM put an end to comparisons with Princess Diana when he said 'no one is trying to fill my mother's shoes' in an archived interview.
